text: okay i don’t think <@U1HKQRLMR> submitted a feedback request through the form (but correct me if i’m wrong megan). she’s kind of a special case since she has access to create jira tickets, which is part of why this came up in the first place.
i like the idea of simplicity, if we have a feedback form and folks can all just use that maybe we should go with that?
I did not submit a form! But I can do so now.
